ts.support

Class TSEnvironmentReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • ts.support.TSValue
      • ts.support.TSReference
        • ts.support.TSEnvironmentReference

  • public final class TSEnvironmentReference
extends TSReference
    The class for Tscript References for lexical environment references (ELS 8.7).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TSEnvironmentReference(TSString name, TSEnvironmentRecord base)
      Create a Reference for a name in an environment.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TSValue getValue()
      Get the value from the Reference.
      boolean isPropertyReference()
      Environment references cannot be property references so this always returns false.
      boolean isUnresolvableReference()
      Is the reference not resolvable? That is, is the name not defined in the environment?
      void putValue(TSValue value)
      Assign a value to the name specified by the Reference.

      • Methods inherited from class ts.support.TSReference

        getReferencedName, isUndefined, toBoolean, toNumber, toPrimitive, toStr

      • Methods inherited from class ts.support.TSValue

        add, divide, equality, isNull, larger, minus, multiply, negate, not, relationalComparison, simpleAssignment, smaller

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TSEnvironmentReference

        TSEnvironmentReference(TSString name,
                      TSEnvironmentRecord base)
        Create a Reference for a name in an environment.
        Parameters:
        name - name to create a reference for
        base - the environment record containing the binding of the name

    • Method Detail

      • isUnresolvableReference

        public boolean isUnresolvableReference()
        Is the reference not resolvable? That is, is the name not defined in the environment?
        Specified by:
        isUnresolvableReference in class TSReference
        Returns:
        true or false, is the name not defined?

      • isPropertyReference

        public boolean isPropertyReference()
        Environment references cannot be property references so this always returns false.
        Specified by:
        isPropertyReference in class TSReference
        Returns:
        true or false, is it a reference to a property?

      • getValue

        public TSValue getValue()
        Get the value from the Reference. Issues an error and returns null if the name is not defined.
        Overrides:
        getValue in class TSValue
        Returns:
        value retrieved from the binding

      • putValue

        public void putValue(TSValue value)
        Assign a value to the name specified by the Reference.
        Overrides:
        putValue in class TSValue
        Parameters:
        value - value to store in the binding of the reference
